body.description: How to make the wireless microphone work better? 1.After use, please press and hold the power button to turn off the power, otherwise the microphone will continue to work until the battery runs out. 2. Please charge the wireless mic for 1 hour before using the device. 3. Please read the user manual before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More models, more suitable for you. new model： Aisizon A5d wireless mic Aisizon A5d Wireless Lavalier Microphone with Noise Cancellation,HI-FI AUDIO, Wireless Lapel Microphone for iPhone 15/Pro/iPad, Android, for Tiktok, YouTube, Video Recording, Live Streaming.

Suitable for multiple devices Easy to use,Switch on and plug in the wireless mic receiver to connect automatically,And do not need to install any software NOTICE: 1.If iPhone/iPad cannot be matched, please exit all open programs and restart the device. 2.It cannot match iPhone 6 or lower,because the recording is done through the 3.5 audio port. 3.Some Samsung phones cannot be matched because it is not an open source system. *After our laboratory testing, except for the following Samsung smartphone version is not applicable, other versions are not found problems, please rest assured that the use of. DO NOT suitable for the following models: Galaxy C9pro/Galaxy Note8/Galaxy S8/Galaxy A40s/Galaxy F52 5G/W2018/Galaxy A50, A50S/Galaxy A60, A60S/Galaxy M30S/Galaxy A6S

How to use the wireless mic on a computer/laptop by the usb adapter for zoom video conferencing? Key: Set the Aisizon wireless microphone as your computer's audio input device. Step 1: Open your computer's sound settings. Find the speaker in the bottom right corner of the desktop, mouse over it, right click on "Open Sound Settings (E)" Step 2: In the "Sound" interface, find "Input" and select the sound input device as "Microphone". The setting is finished. Now, You can use your computer to record, make videos, or use ZOOM to video conference with colleagues. One tip: In the upper right corner of the "Sound" screen, find the "Sound Control Panel". Click on the "Sound" device, find the microphone, and click on the properties in the lower right corner. The microphone properties screen appears, click "Listen", then the sound of the microphone can be emitted from the computer speakers. Now, your computer will become a loudspeaker.

Type-c to Lightning adapter More efficient and convenient links, with high-definition sound quality: Use the Type-c to lightning adapter，it compatible with Apple device, as well as the ability to be used with most electronic devices without software.Multiple devices(Requires Type-c port) or groups of people can use this wireless mic, not limited to the connection port. Notice: If it is an iPhone/iPad device, and the adapter cannot be used, please exit all open programs or restart the device. During the live broadcast, please exit all programs so that the microphone has enough system resources to work.

Package Included: · 1 x wireless microphone · 1 x receiver · 1 x Type-C to Lightning adapter · 1 x USB data cable · 1 x English & Chinese bilingual manual How to make the wireless microphone work better? 1.After use, please press and hold the power button to turn off the power, otherwise the microphone will continue to work until the battery runs out. 2. Please charge the wireless mic for 1 hour before using the device. 3. Please read the user manual before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over a Year Later, Still Going Strong
reviews.reviewText: I got this mic, after one of the first Bluetooth mics I got quit on me under a year. This one's going strong. It's easy to use - it literally is plug and play (well, you might want to charge it first). But no "go to this website, download this program, hold your mouth sideways when you first plug this in," sort of business.I use a simple free, open-source software audio editor, and record my sermons. It makes for good podcasts, and never causes problems. I just made a YouTube video today utilizing it in a tutorial. If you're looking for a quick, easy, convenient solution to recording voice or audio, this is quality for an economic value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You NEED this mic!
reviews.reviewText: I teach a class in person but also have people tuning in through Zoom. This mic is perfect! It comes in an organised box with all the components. The mic can clip on to a shirt and does not have the static sound when I move around. I can then put the wireless part into my computer via USB or my iPhone (or android if you want one).Another time I had a friend using my phone and I was about 10-12 feet away with the mic on my collar. The video turned out great as if I had my phone and was talking into it. Actually, the audio is better than talking straight into your phone.Can be used to record or use live.Highly recommend. Clear sound, wireless, easy to use, simple but very effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good microphone for amateur projects
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this wireless microphone for my home studio setup, and I must say, I am quite impressed with its overall performance. However, I did encounter a few minor issues, which is why I am giving it 4 stars.PROS:1. Sound Quality: The audio captured by this microphone is clear, with minimal background noise. The frequency response is well-balanced, delivering crisp highs and warm lows, making it perfect for vocals, podcasts, or live performances.2. Wireless Connectivity: The range on this wireless microphone is fantastic, allowing me to move around freely without any signal dropouts. The connection is stable, and I didn't experience any latency issues during my usage.3. Build Quality: The microphone itself feels sturdy and well-constructed, and the included receiver is compact and easy to set up. The metal casing ensures durability, and I believe this microphone will last a long time.4. Battery Life: The rechargeable battery in the microphone lasts for a reasonable amount of time. I was able to use it for multiple events without having to recharge it in between.CONS:1. Slight Interference: I did experience some occasional interference during my recordings, which resulted in a few crackling noises. This was not a deal-breaker, but it could be a bit annoying at times.2. Pop Filter: The microphone didn't come with a built-in pop filter or windscreen, which means you might need to purchase one separately to avoid plosive sounds.In conclusion, this wireless microphone offers great sound quality, wireless freedom, and robust build quality. Although it has a few minor issues, they don't significantly impact the overall performance. If you're in the market for a reliable wireless microphone, this product is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality microphone at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I needed a wireless microphone to record online lectures and tried two other microphones before purchasing this one. Unlike the other two products which had bluetooth connection issues and sound quality issues, this microphone has great sound quality and a decent noise cancelling function! The IT who conducts quality checks of the online record lectures at my instituion gave a green light after one trial. Very easy to use. You can adjust the sound output volume by placing the microphone closer/farther from your face. I also liked that it was very small. Would be a great purchase for anyone looking for a mic for lectures and conference call. The only caveat is that because it is so small, you need to make sure not to lose it. One time, I forgot to take the microphone off my shirt ( I even forgot I had a microphone hooked to the collar of my shirt because it is so lightweighted) and headed out for lunch. When I came back, I realized that the mic was missing. Fortunately, I dropped it in the office but it could be easily lost given how small it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy plug and play
reviews.reviewText: Got this for gaming. I hate headsets. Have other players voices come through my sound system so I only needed a mic. It works well. Sounds good. And I have had no feed back issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic for recording simple videos!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this microphone about a year, and it's been fantastic. I use it to create simple instructional videos for my social media accounts. It picks up my voice really well, and I've haven't had many troubleshooting issues with it. Great device at a really nice price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this wireless lavalier mic, and I must say, it has completely exceeded my expectations! This little device has revolutionized the way I capture audio for my videos and presentations. The sound quality is great for the price, delivering clear audio. The fact that it's wireless is super helpful, by allowing freedom of movement, allowing me to speak and move around without any restrictions or tangled cables. The setup was a breeze, and I was impressed by how quickly it synced with my phone.The build quality feels sturdy and reliable. The battery life is impressive, lasting through extended recording sessions without any hiccups. Additionally, the range of the wireless connection is excellent, ensuring a stable signal even when I'm a few meters away from my recording device. Overall, this mic has proven to be a game-changer for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Microphone for my teachers to wear during lecture
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because I am sometimes unable to use my hands to take notes due to multiple sclerosis flares. This microphone allows my professors to wear the small device, be plugged into my computer and be accurately transcribed through a program I use on my Macbook. The microphone quality is amazing and high quality. My only issue is that i wish there were a sturdier way for the microphone to be clipped to a shirt. The microphone is not dummy proof, but it is pretty easy to set up with the instructions just make sure you charge it for 1 hour first!
I needed a workaround for a hybrid class in a room poorly equipped for that and this has worked well so far

It stopped working in 2 days of using it. Initially the audio quality was very good and I was thrilled with the purchase. Recorded a few videos on my PC and the next day it started giving a buzzing sound in all audios across all devices - phone, PC etc. Audios are not usable due to this noise. Tried to return the product but from Singapore to send to USA the shipping costs me double the amount of the product cost. So I just have to throw it into garbage now. Amazon, you can do better to offer returns for those overseas.

I've had this item for just over 2 months now and around 1 month ago it stopped working. I can turn it on and it turns off again immediately. I had used it for the first month with no issues. WASTE OF MONEY.
This mic is easy to use. I use it on my phone and laptop.
The mic is working but the quality of the mic and connections doesn't worth what paid for at all. I had $39 mic which had better quality than this one
